      • m_CompMode

        private static boolean m_CompMode
        Enters C version compatibility mode if set to true (emulates features of the original C implementation that are inconsistent with the algorithm as described in Lovins's paper)

      • removeEnding

        private java.lang.String removeEnding(java.lang.String word)
        Finds and removes ending from given word.
        参数:
        word - the word to work on
        返回:
        the processed word

      • recodeEnding

        private java.lang.String recodeEnding(java.lang.String word)
        Recodes ending of given word.
        参数:
        word - the word to work on
        返回:
        the processed word

      • stem

        public java.lang.String stem(java.lang.String word)
        Returns the stemmed version of the given word. Word is converted to lower case before stemming.
        参数:
        word - a string consisting of a single word
        返回:
        the stemmed word

      • stemString

        public java.lang.String stemString(java.lang.String str)
        Stems everything in the given string. String is converted to lower case before stemming.
        参数:
        str - the string to stem
        返回:
        the processed string

        public static Stemmer getInstance()
